example[1]: a mass of bloom on the apple trees
definition[1]: the healthy happy appearance that someone has, especially when they are young
example[2]: The rosy bloom of her cheeks had faded.
definition[2]: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open
definition[3]: to become happier, healthier, or more successful in a way that is very noticeable
example[3]: She was blooming the last time I saw her.
